message:
The chief executive at data security firm HBGary Federal has resigned his job following a high-profile hack staged by online protest group "Anonymous."

‎"'I need to focus on taking care of my family & rebuilding my reputation,' [Barr] said. 'It's been a challenge to do that & run a company &, given that I've been the focus of much of the bad press, I hope that, by leaving, HBGary... can get away from some of that....' He went on to complain that even at home, hackers were trying to break into his personal router, leaving him no choice but to drop offline entirely."

http://www.rawstory.com/rs/2011/03/01/hbgary-ceo-aaron-barr-resigns-amid-anonymous-scandal/
